Hermitcraft 8: 3 - This took me MANY DAYS!
Iskall goes on an adventure to find a trident, and counts the number of days it takes in minecraft. iskall uses multiple different strategies and finally finds the special way of finding a trident! Iskall returns to his and Ethos shattered savannah biome on the hermitcraft server and builds up a massive hanging cliffside house
